extension.description:
This template is a basic theme you can use on a joomla website for a forum or other Minecraft related community.
This template was originally created by Seth Moon on the Foundation Framework, and modified by Sean Alewine to work with Joomla.

field.name: Title
field.label: DIsplayed Title
field.description: Enter the title that will display at the top of the webpage

field.name: Tagline
field.label: Site Tagline
field.description: Enter the subtext displayed below the title

field.name: background
field.label: Background Image
field.description: Select the image you would like tiled as the sites background
